cpl.readme:
A plugin to make ~TiddlyWiki read-only. You can hide: * ''All'' toolbar buttons * 'Sidebar' button (to switch Sidebar) and 'Advanced search' button (next to Search) * All Sidebar tabs tagged with $:/tags/SideBar. Click the Publish button <> next to the sidebar button <>/<> to start making your TW 'publish-ready'. A new window with six tabs opens. Read the Help tab and follow the 5 steps. <<< ''Note:''
@@.RED Although you can hide the 'Sidebar' button and 'Advanced Search' button, they remain 'active'!@@ <<< There are a few ways to return from readonly to edit mode, see [[Help|$:/plugins/tg/ro/help]].
